items.title: Schumer readying to fight for health care in government funding battle
items.description: The apparent red line from the Senate Democratic leader comes six months after Schumer stood down in the face of another government funding battle.

items.title: Trump vows to punish critics after slaying of Charlie Kirk
items.description: President Donald Trump and his staff blame “radical left political violence” for the killing of their friend and Republican activist.

items.title: They came to see Charlie Kirk. They say his killing won’t quiet them.
items.description: Conservatives who saw the controversial activist shot dead at Utah Valley University were left shaken but said their movement would only grow stronger...

items.title: A traffic stop, two car chases, then a lockdown at the CIA
items.description: Police pursuing undocumented immigrants had the drama of a TV procedural.

items.title: Charlie Kirk’s killing and a new age of political violence
items.description: With the death of conservative activist Charlie Kirk, the United States is entering a new era of fear.
